title: '4' Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: 5D Torus
description:
A specially manufactured container of five-dimensional tori.

Highly specific materials are required to construct shapes in extra dimensions. These tori are used to contain the strong fields generated in the manufacture of scientific components.

title: Access Ramp
description: A reinforced, non-ferrous ramp to provide access to buildings.

title: Adjustable Chair
description: A comfortable chair designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with only mild numbing of the posterior.

title: Agricultural Terminal
description:
thumb|Agricultural terminal
A research station tailored to the needs of Farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.

title: Albumen Pearl Orb
description:
A medium-sized, farmable Crystal Orb that yields an occasional harvest of valuable Albumen Pearls.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 2 hours

title: Alliance of Galactic Travellers Decal
description:
thumb|Decal in use
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal represents the Alliance of Galactic Travellers, and the value of nomadic exploration.

title: Amino Hub Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal represents the Amino Hub, and the principles of community, adventure and discovery.

title: Ancient Data Structure
description:
Ancient Data Structure is a type of 35px icon. It contains one of the following:
* Navigation Data
* Drop Pod Coordinate Data

title: Antimatter Reactor
description:
An autonomous baryogenesis reactor, this device can be left to harvest reality paradoxes and convert them into usable antimatter. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.

The resulting antimatter is safely contained, ready for use in all standard hyperspace power units.

title: Appearance Modifier
description:
A buildable module that allows the users to adjust their personal appearance settings.

The module applies advanced holographic techniques to recalibrate the light around the user, allowing them to adopt whatever appearance they desire. Visual data must be properly formated before use.

title: Armchair
description: A comfortable chair designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with only mild numbing of the posterior.

title: Autonomous Mining Unit
description:
thumb|Empty and Full AMU

An automated harvester for the mining of resources. Once activated, the AMU extracts minerals without the need for supervision, providing a regular yield until the site is exhausted.

title: Barnacle
description:
A tenacious arthropod, naturally found encrusting stationary or slow-moving underwater objects.

This variety can be encouraged to affix itself to a chosen position, adding an aged marine apeearance to bases.

title: Barrel Fabricator
description: Regularly fabricates useful items for its constructor. Item retrieval requires an AtlasPass v1 for identity verification.

title: Base Computer
description:
thumb|A base computer prior to base construction
Portable land registration service.

When placed, contacts Universal Cartographic Archive to establish ownership of land. Successful registration allows the construction of base modules across any site of the user's choosing.

title: Base Salvage Capsule
description:
A construction recovery device.

This optional piece of base technology stores and preserves matter left over after the destruction of a previous base.

title: Bed
description: A generously proportioned single bed, designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with minimum overhang of extremities.

title: Bio-Lantern
description:
A secure biological containment vessel, complete with its own purified internal atmosphere.

Pre-installed bioluminescent insects provide a soft, flickering light, perfect for those seeking natural lighting for their base.

title: Biological Room (Expansion)
description: This spacious greenhouse chamber naturally filters and oxygenates the air supply, and offers a little sanctuary of green in freighter habitation.

title: Bronze Astronaut Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze. This astronaut statue is a tribute to all galactic explorers.

title: Bronze Atlas Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze. This statue is a decorative replica of an Atlas Interface. Its core rotates, powered by an unknown force...

title: Bronze Diplo Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze. This statue depicts a long-necked quadrupedal species.

title: Bronze Fighter Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze. This statue depicts the iconic starship Alpha Vector.

title: Bronze Gek Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze. This statue depicts a Gek gesturing towards the sky.

title: Bronze Walker Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze. This statue depicts the Sentinel Walker, an advanced combat unit.

title: Bubble Cluster
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: ByteBeat Device
description:
An advanced audio generator, allowing the user to synthesise complex musical arrangements.

Multiple devices may be placed in sequence or connected to lights to generate spectacular displays.

title: Cable Pod
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: CafÃ© 42 Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal represents the CafÃ© 42, and the spirit of friends, fun and good vibes. Welcome to the CafÃ©.

title: Calcishroom
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Canister Rack
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Capilliary Shell
description:
thumb|Capilliary Shell in the wilds
A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Carnivorous Bush
description:
A medium-size decorative plant. Each of its leaves is covered in a thin film of sticky latex. Insects that land on these leaves are slowly absorbed by digestive hormones mixed in with the glue.

Avoid accidental skin contact.

title: Ceiling Light
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Ceiling Panel
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Celebratory Cactus
description:
Delightful succulent baubles, these lovely plants top their bulbous bodies with a show of beautiful flowers.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Chitinous Cage
description:
A proteinous formation of unknown origin, replicated aboard the Space Anomaly. Its skeltal structure often retains pockets of air, leading to slightly warmer or cooler temperatures in the centre of the cage.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Compound Bulb
description:
This vegetative structure is high in antioxidants, though a thick layer of scales makes it impractical for farming.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Construction Parts
description: Construction Parts is a visual index of construction parts, for the most up to date list of parts please reference the Build Menu.

title: Corner Table
description: An all-purpose work surface built from non-magnetic, corrosion resistant materials.

title: Crate Fabricator
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Crew Footlocker
description: A sturdy personal locker, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Crew Locker
description: A study

title: Cuboid Room
description: A small, cuboid construction module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

title: Cuboid Room Flooring
description: Hard-wearing composite floor panels cut for cuboid rooms.

title: Cuboid Room Foundation Strut
description: A sturdy leg for supporting cuboid rooms.

title: Cuboid Room Foundation Strut Quad
description: A prefabricated set of four legs for supporting cuboid rooms.

title: Cultivation Chamber
description:
A temperature controlled bio-room. A bed of nutrient-rich soil provides ideal conditions for cultivating agricultural crops.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Curious Corn
description:
Sprouting decorative corn. Comes in a variety of colours. May attract decorative wildlife.

Unable to reproduce naturally. Must be hand-pollinated.

title: Curly Coral
description: A delicate marine incertebrate, cultivated for potted growth. Its distinctivve looping structure gives it an attractive whisical appearance.

title: Curved Corridor
description:
A Curved Corridor is a Base building structure designed to connect larger structures together.

As compared to Straight Corridors, they are curved in a semi-circular fashion, with windows on the outer side of the curve.

title: Curved Freighter Corridor
description: A Curved Freighter Corridor is a Base building structure designed to connect larger structures together, specifically on a Freighter.

title: Cylindrical Room
description: The core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

title: Cylindrical Room Frame
description: A Cylindrical Room Frame is a Base building structure designed to support other structures, most generally a Cylindrical Room.

title: Desk Chair
description: A comfortable chair designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with only mild numbing of the posterior.

title: Door
description: A compression-sealed, standard door suitable for all rooms and corridors.

title: Double Cultivation Chamber
description:
A temperature controlled bio-room. Two beds of nutrient-rich soil provides ideal conditions for cultivating agricultural crops.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Drawers
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Dwarf Palm
description:
A squat, easily-managed form of the larger palm species.

Place outdoor to attract wildlife and to purify the air.

title: Electric Cube
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Emergency Light
description: A n emergency floor light, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Evergreen Tree
description:
A hardy evergreen tree, able to survive in a wide-range of climates.

Waxy leaves with a silvery underside provide excellent light harvesting abilities, as well as year-round interest and colour.

title: Exocraft Summoning Station
description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft from anywhere else in that system.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu to ease of use. Can be compressed and carried within the Exosuit with 20px|link=/35px|link=/35px|link= (PC/PS/XB) for later redeployment.

title: Expanding Cube Gadget
description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity.

This precisely crafted gadget utilises a localised gravitational field, delighting and fascinating base visitors.

title: Flag 1
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flag 2
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flag 3
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flag 4
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flarecap Toadstool
description:
This species of fungus is notable for its dense capillary network and bioluminescent qualities. A circulating chain of chemical reasions produces the toadstool's nocturnal glow.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Flat Panel
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Floor Mat
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flora Containment 1
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flora Containment 2
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Flora Containment 3
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Floral Canister
description: A containment vessel for alien flora, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Foundation (Base building)
description: The base unit for all construction projects, providing a solid foundation for any structure. Can be anchored to all types of terrain.

title: Frostwort
description:
A large crystal flower with radiant blue blooms, found only in snowy biomes. Frostwort can be farmed and makes a reliable crop, and its adaptation to harsh conditions results in highly frequent harvests.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Frozen climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 1 hour

title: Frozen Planter
description:
A snow-filled stone trough. This is the perfect home for the small, tough plants that grow on ice-bound worlds.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Fruit Tree
description: Fruit form, toxicity and existence will vary according to local climatic and pollinator conditions.

title: Fungal Cluster
description:
A spherical fungus with internal gills, found only in toxic biomes. Fungal Clusters can be transplanted for cultivation, yielding a bountiful harvest.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Toxic climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

title: Gamma Weed
description:
A luminous, leafy flowering plant that thrives in radioactive biomes and can be cultivated to yield a bountiful harvest.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Radioactive climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

title: Gem-Encrusted Rock
description:
Once a discarded byproduct of deep-level crystal mining, the aesthetic value of the rocks is now better appreciated.

It provides decorative opportunities for bases.

title: Glass Roofed Corridor
description: Corridor with reinforced glass roofing.

title: Glitching Separator
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Globe Tree
description:
A thin tree with a large, fleshy root system, well adapted to hot climates.

Root bulb may be tapped for a source of drinkable liquid, but this is not advised outside of the most dire circumstances.

title: Gold Astronaut Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in gold. This astronaut statue is a tribute to all galactic explorers.

title: Gold Atlas Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in gold. This statue is a decorative replica of an Atlas Interface. Its core rotates, powered by an unknown force...

title: Gold Diplo Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in gold. This statue depicts a long-necked quadrupedal species.

title: Gold Fighter Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in gold. This statue depicts the iconic starship Alpha Vector.

title: Gold Gek Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in gold. This statue depicts a Gek gesturing towards the sky.

title: Gold Walker Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in gold. This statue depicts the Sentinel Walker, an advanced combat unit.

title: Gravitino Host
description:
A strange, potentially parasitic plant that yields an occasional harvest of the highly tradable commodity, Gravitino Balls.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 2 hours

title: Green Wall Screen
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Hardy Shrub
description:
This tough conifer pumps its sap with anti-freezing enzymes, allowing it to survive unimaginably low temperatures.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Hazard Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

The decal serves as a warning to all those who would venture past it.

title: Hazard Protection Unit (base building)
description:
A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge the user's Hazard Protection systems.

The Hazard Protection Unit requires 10 Ferrite Dust to provide service in Origins release.

title: Hexagonal Table
description: An all-purpose work surface built from non-magnetic, corrosion resistant materials.

title: Hexplate Bush
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Holographic Chart Projector
description: Holographic Display

title: Holographic Globe Gadget
description:
Hologoraphic Globe Gadget is a base building product and can be found in the Interior Decorations category.

The product can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 800

title: Horrific Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the 'exotic' fauna discovered breeding in the remains of an unlucky intergalactic freighter.

title: Hydroponic Tray
description: A self-contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops. Build requirement: must be placed indoors.

title: Industrial Barrel
description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Industrial Room (Expansion)
description: A spacious chamber with an industrial aesthetic, for expanding habitable spaces inside large spaceships.

title: L-Shaped Corridor
description: A sturdy, corridor module for connecting rooms, with an L-shaped bend.

title: Lab Lamp
description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

title: Ladder
description: A strong, lightweight ladder with reinforced anchor points for attaching to walls.

title: Large Hydroponic Tray
description:
thumb|Large hydroponic trays in a freighter
A self-contained growth system for the cultivation of agricultural crops (usually done indoors). Can support up to four plants.

title: Large Monitor Station
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Large Refiner
description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Large Refiner allows three different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 

The Large Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

title: Large Storage Unit
description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Light Box
description:
A special construction module fashioned entirely from light-emitting panels. Can be used to construct walls of light.

The box may be recoloured before or after placement. Requires power to operate.

title: Light Fissure
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Light Table
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Locked Crate
description: Regularly fabricates useful items for its constructor.

title: Locker
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Marine Rock
description:
A pleasing mineral formation, crystallised from oceaanic salts. May contain aquatic fossils and/or lifeforms.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Medium Refiner
description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Medium Refiner allows two different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios.

The Medium Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

title: Mineral Arch
description:
A remarkable piece of geological geometry. A stable load-bearing arch, infused with curiously granular solid geodes.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Monitor Station
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Mud Hut
description:
This simple mud hut was modelled after a mysterious structure discovered in the mists of planet Saxm A13. Similar structures have been found throughout the universe, with no proven hypothesis regarding their origin. 

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Nanotube Crate
description:
A packed crate of carbon nanotubes.

These tiny but incredibly strong tubes are required in the construction of tiny but incredibly strong scientific components.

title: Nautilon Chamber
description: An advanced, fully-airlocked docking station for the Nautilon submarine.

title: NipNip
description:
thumb|right|NipNip being farmed
This medicinal herb is known for its pungent buds, which are harvested to produce Gek Nip. NipNip thrives in dank environments, and often grows as a weed.

Suitable for hydroponic planting indoors. Needs a tropical or humid climate before planting outdoors.

title: Noise Box
description: A special construction module designed to emit a high-frequency noise. Pitch may be adjusted to the user's requirements.

title: Octa-Cabinet
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Optical Solvent
description:
Several bottles of optical solvent.

The liquid in these bottles is used to wash away surplus light that may otherwise cause decay in scientific components.

title: Orange Wall Screen
description: An all-purpose work surface built from non-magnetic, corrosion resistant materials.

title: Oscilloscope
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Ossified Star
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Plate Stem
description: The broad, plate-like leaf topping

title: Pocket Reality Generator
description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity for bases.

A model of reality itself, as viewed from the perspective of an impossible observer. Infinite levels of detail wait to be discovered by the viewer with a powerful enough lens.

title: Portable Refiner
description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Portable Refiner can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation. Note: the Portable Refiner requires fuel to operate.

title: Potted Plant
description: A decorative pot for indoor plants.

title: Pulsing Heart
description:
A fibrous metallic superstructure binds this warm and vital organ with the core of the ship. Without it, the ship would be nothing, a lifeless husk.

Hold [L1/A/LB] and [R1/D/RB] together to engage Pulse Jump.

Hold [Circle/Shift/B] to initiate in-flight speed boost.

infobox.desc: Spaceflight propulsion, boosts and on-demand Pulse Jumps through local system.

title: Race Force Amplifier
description: Provides a boost to your Exocraft during races.

title: Race Initiator
description: This platform acts as the start and finish line for Exocraft field tests, allowing Travellers to practice manoeuvring and speed.

title: Race Obstacle
description: Provides extra challenge for Exocraft races.

title: Raised Small Paving
description: Hard-wearing composite paving for the construction of walkways and paved areas.

title: Rattle Spine
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Robotic Arm
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Robotic Companion
description:
A perfectly-programmed and error free drone.

This miniature robot will be a lively presence in your base, bringing joy, laughter and a constant low level humming to your home.

title: Rock Garden
description: A garden module, complete with decorative mineral formation and built-in capillary matting for optimium humidity control.

title: Round Table
description: An all-purpose work surface built from non-magnetic, corrosion resistant materials.

title: Salvage Crate
description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Sample Containment
description: A sinister experimental tube, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Secure Briefcase
description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Server
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Shelf Panel
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Short-Range Teleporter
description:
A low-powered teleporter, construction for instantaneous travel across short distances.

When wired to both a power source and another short-range teleporter, allows near-instant travel between nearby locations.

title: Side Panel
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Silver Astronaut Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver. This astronaut statue is a tribute to all galactic explorers.

title: Silver Atlas Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver. This statue is a decorative replica of an Atlas Interface. Its core rotates, powered by an unknown force...

title: Silver Diplo Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver. This statue depicts a long-necked quadrupedal species.

title: Silver Fighter Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver. This statue depicts the iconic starship Alpha Vector.

title: Silver Gek Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver. This statue depicts a Gek gesturing towards the sky.

title: Silver Walker Statue
description: An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver. This statue depicts the Sentinel Walker, an advanced combat unit.

title: Simple Desk
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Small Aquarium
description:
Small Aquarium is a base building product and can be found in the Exotic Collectibles category.

The product can be purchased from the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion for 800

title: Small Crate
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Small Paving
description: Hard-wearing composite paving for the construction of walkways and paved areas.

title: Solid Cube
description: A large solid cube.

title: Spindle Tree
description: A thin, non-fruiting tree. Root system is integrated with highly-adapted fungal symbiotes.\n\nSupplied with its own mushrooms for ease of establishment. Fungus is non-toxic and non-spreading.

title: Square Room
description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

title: Standing Planter
description: A standing planter system for indoor cultivation of agricultural crops.

title: Star Bramble
description:
A medium-sized, farmable plant that yields an occasional harvest of valuable Star Bulbs.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Lush climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

title: Storage Container
description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

title: Storage Container - Yellow
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Storage Panel
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Storage Unit
description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

title: Straight Corridor
description: A standard straight corridor module for connecting rooms.

title: Succulent Tree
description:
The bark on this tree is misleading. Neither rough nor hard, its flesh is instead soft and moist to the touch. Wrinkles in the surface store extra water for times of hardship.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: T-Shaped Corridor
description: A corridor module with a branching, t-shaped form, for joining multiple rooms.

title: Tall Cabinet
description: Builable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Tech Panel
description: A non-functional tech panel for decorative purposes.

title: Technology Room (Expansion)
description: A spacious chamber with a technical aesthetic, for expanding habitable spaces inside large spaceships.

title: Teleport Cable
description: Advanced fibre-optic cabling, designed to link one or more Short-Range Teleporters.

title: Tentacle Spire
description:
This delightful architectural floral combines two highly popular aesthetics: wriggling tentacles and giant fungi.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Tentacled Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

This decal depicts a many-armed sentience, found drifting in the dark places of the universe.

title: Terbium Growth
description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

title: Tradeable
description: Tradeables are a type of alien races or at the Galactic Trade Terminals. Some of these products are also used in Base building.

title: Umbrella Tree
description:
This decorative tree has evolved to cope with high levels of background radiation.  Its central glowing core attracts wildlife and is in no way a sense organ.  It does not watch you.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Venom Urchin
description:
thumb|Venom Urchin grown in a hydroponics tray
A small, innocuous looking plant whose leaves periodically secrete a small amount of potent Sac Venom, a valuable trading commodity.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 3 hours 20 mins

title: Vigilant Taro
description:
The eye-like protrusions on this bizarre organism are capable of both processing light and performing simple calculations, although it is unclear what they are watching for...

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Void Husk
description:
This eggshel still whispers a faint song, as though connected to a distant chorus...

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Wall Fan
description: A decorative ventilation detail for wall.

title: Wall Flag 1
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Wall Flag 2
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Wall Flag 3
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Wall Unit
description: A wall-mounted, faux storage unit for decorative purposes.

title: Warning Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

The decal depicts the final state of an unfortunate soul.

title: Watchful Protrusion
description:
While this planet can be cultivated as a crop, consumption is not advised.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Weapon Rack
description:
A buildable storage rack for Multi-Tools.

This archive allows for a large expansion to the user's Multi-Tool collection, via a system of long-term storage. Multi-Tools placed in storage are unavailable for immediate use, however they remain available for restoration to the user's active equipment list at a later date.

title: Wizened Stump
description:
This ancient stump was harvested from a clonal tree colony, estimated to have lived for over a hundred millenia. Its bark releases a pleasant mossy fragrance.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

title: Wonder Projector
description:
A buildable holographic display, designed to visualise any discovery currently listed in your Personal Records.

Use the projector to manage these records directly, or view them from the Wonders section of the Catalogue.

title: Worktop
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: X-Shaped Corridor
description: An x-shaped corridor unit for connecting four rooms in a cruciform arrangement.
